means: 注入口，熔渣，口炎性腹泻

word_mean: 斯泼卢，口炎性腹泻：一种慢性营养吸收不良综合征，有热带性和非热带两种
铸道：在牙科学上指金属或其他材料被浇铸或压入铸模时所经的孔道
浇注系统中的垂直通道。通常带有一定的锥度。

sentence.Network_en: They have pointed out the similarities of the sprue syndromes in man and TGE.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们强调了人的鹅口疮综合症和TGE的共同点.

sentence.Network_en: This would necessitate a manual operation to remove the unwanted sprue.
sentence.Network_cn: 这就要有一个手工操作以去除不需要的主流道废料.

sentence.Network_en: They must be carefully cut from the sprue to prevent damage.
sentence.Network_cn: 必须小心的剪取零件以防损坏.

means.word_mean: 1. a chronic disorder that occurs in tropical and nontropical forms and in both children and adults; nutrients are not absorbed; symptoms include foul-smelling diarrhea and emaciation
